sentences.en: Although her illness is serious, her condition is beginning to stabilize.
sentences.cn: 虽然她病得很重，但病情正开始趋于稳定。

sentences.en: Cataracts is a condition that affects the transparency of the lenses.
sentences.cn: 白内障是一种影响晶状体透明性的疾病。

sentences.en: Conditions in the prison were atrocious.
sentences.cn: 这座监狱的条件糟透了。

sentences.en: He remained in a critical condition after suffering heart failure.
sentences.cn: 他发生心力衰竭后病情一直危重。

sentences.en: He spoke to reporters on condition that he was not identified.
sentences.cn: 在不披露身份的条件下，他接受了记者的采访。

sentences.en: He was concerned with the enhancement of the human condition.
sentences.cn: 他关心人类生存环境的改善。

sentences.en: He was epileptic and refused to take medication for his condition.
sentences.cn: 他患有癫痫，但是拒绝服药治疗。

sentences.en: He was in a critical condition, fighting for his life in hospital.
sentences.cn: 他的情况很危急，正在医院里与死神搏斗。

sentences.en: He was too out of condition to clamber over the top.
sentences.cn: 他体质太差，爬不到山顶。

sentences.en: Her condition took a sharp turn for the worse.
sentences.cn: 她的病情突然急剧恶化。

sentences.en: I got three years' probation, on condition that I stay at the hostel for a year.
sentences.cn: 我得到三年试用期，条件是我必须在招待所呆满一年。

sentences.en: In May, staff went on strike, demanding better pay and conditions .
sentences.cn: 五月份员工举行了罢工，要求提高工资和改善工作条件。

sentences.en: It is normal practice not to reveal details of a patient's condition.
sentences.cn: 不透露患者病情的细节是惯常的做法。

sentences.en: It was a real prize due to its rarity and good condition.
sentences.cn: 因为稀有并且品相完好，它价值连城。

sentences.en: People are conditioned by society.
sentences.cn: 人们受到社会的影响。

sentences.en: Profits increased by £1.5m, despite the difficult economic conditions.
sentences.cn: 尽管经济形势不佳，利润还是增长了150万英镑。

sentences.en: Rust and flaking paint mean the metalwork is in poor condition.
sentences.cn: 生锈和掉漆说明金属配件损毁严重。

sentences.en: The car has been well maintained and is in excellent condition.
sentences.cn: 汽车一直保养得很好，状况极佳

sentences.en: The conditions during the first half of the match were appalling.
sentences.cn: 比赛上半场的天气情况很糟糕。

sentences.en: The heart condition had stunted his growth a bit.
sentences.cn: 心脏病已经多少影响了他的成长。

sentences.en: This condition is more prevalent in women than in men.
sentences.cn: 这种病症在女性当中比在男性当中更为普遍。

sentences.en: You'll also get expert advice on keeping your hair in good condition.
sentences.cn: 你还会获得有关如何保持良好发质的专家建议。

sentences.en: you’re in no condition to tackle the stairs.
sentences.cn: 你的身体不适宜爬楼梯。
